title: Vasantika Haaram: Diamond & Emerald Grand Necklace
materials: Natural Sapphire Beads. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricately handcrafted Haaram featuring a floral motif centerpiece adorned with a carved emerald. The neckline showcases a graduating arrangement of emeralds and diamonds, leading to a dazzling pendant. Delicately dangling sapphire beads add a touch of royalty. The setting is a classic prong and pave setting to maximize the brilliance of the diamonds. Features a stylized paisley design (kalki)
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A perfect heirloom piece for generations to come.
description: This Vasantika Haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and superior craftsmanship. The combination of high-quality diamonds, vibrant emeralds, and rich sapphire beads creates a captivating visual appeal. The piece embodies traditional South Indian aesthetics while maintaining a modern sensibility, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a long-lasting shine, preserving the beauty of the necklace for years to come.
